about_the_game:
WELCOME TO PROJECT ZETA

(Early Development - Join our official Discord for updates and server uptime!)

Project ZETA is a third-person multiteam MOBA game where five teams of three players battle against each other in a race to acquire the game’s most precious resource – Prisms.

BE THE HERO THAT CHANGES THE GAME

Choose from four distinct roles—Fighter, Marksman, Assassin, or Mage—each crafted with unique abilities to deliver a powerful impact on the battlefield. Project ZETA rewards creative combat strategies, where every player can shine and be a hero for their squad. Master the art of combos to trigger devastating multikills in chaotic, action-packed encounters.

MULTIPLE TEAMS, MULTIPLE STRATEGIES

With five competing teams, the strategies are endless. Battle across the Aran Plateau, where victory depends on quick thinking and adaptability. Multiple dynamic objectives give players the freedom to choose their path to victory—will you play the long game or go all-in for a bold, aggressive strategy?

MOBA ACTION, AMPLIFIED

Say goodbye to the limitations of traditional third-person MOBAs. Project ZETA blends the strategic gameplay advantages of a classic isometric MOBA with the amplified immersion of a third-person game. The result is an evolved take on action PvP that enables players to take multiteam fights head-on.

UNRESTRICTED PLAY

Project ZETA invites players of all skill levels to succeed with their control scheme of choice. The game was designed from the ground up with both controller and mouse & keyboard players in mind to ensure that all players have an equitable experience.

ext_user_account_notice: Krafton ID (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Project ZETA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (VRAM 8GB) or Radeon RX 6600XT (VRAM 8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: [Early Development] Five teams enter the Aran Plateau—one emerges victorious. Bring your squad into the next evolution of the third-person MOBA, blending explosive hero-driven action with dynamic multiteam strategy. Outsmart and outmaneuver your opponents to create your path to victory.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
